verses.name: Joshua 15:19
verses.text: Who answered, Give me a blessing; for thou hast given me a south land; give me also springs of water. And he gave her the upper springs, and the nether springs.

verses.name: Joshua 15:20
verses.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Judah according to their families.

verses.name: Joshua 15:21
verses.text: And the uttermost cities of the tribe of the children of Judah toward the coast of Edom southward were Kabzeel, and Eder, and Jagur,

verses.name: Joshua 15:22
verses.text: And Kinah, and Dimonah, and Adadah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:23
verses.text: And Kedesh, and Hazor, and Ithnan,

verses.name: Joshua 15:25
verses.text: And Hazor, Hadattah, and Kerioth, and Hezron, which is Hazor,
